name: Unified Exploration
text: Action: place this card in your play area. While this card is in your play area after the Explantaery allience or you explore a planet you each gain 1 trade good or 2 comodities. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the allience units return this card to the allience player.

name: Wealth Agreement
text: When the Er'ock player replensishes commodidtes, gain trade goods equal to their commodity value.

name: Diplomatic Base
text: When you recive this card you must immediatly attach this card to 1 non-home planet you control. Its Influence value is increses by 3. This planet may not have more then 3 infantry and 1 mech of each player. Excess units on this planet are returned to the space area. This planet may be traded as part of a transaction.
